# pause()

**Instance Method**

Pauses audio playback.

## Declaration

```swift
func pause() -> Bool
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when playback is paused successfully, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] when playback is already paused or when an error occurred.

## Playing Sounds

- **beep()**: Plays the system beep.
- **isPlaying**: A Boolean that indicates whether the sound is playing its audio data.
- **play()**: Initiates audio playback.
- **resume()**: Resumes audio playback.
- **stop()**: Concludes audio playback.
